title: Calories in a Cinnamon Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in a cinnamon roll, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard bakery-style cinnamon roll with cream cheese icing, approximately 100 g, baked fresh.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cinnamon roll has about 430 kcal, mostly from carbs and fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cinnamon roll without icing?
faqs.a: About 330 kcal, saving around 100 kcal from the sugary glaze.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Typically 60 g total carbs, including 30 g sugars and 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a cinnamon roll high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 18 g fat per roll, with 8 g saturated fat from butter and icing.

faqs.q: How much protein in a cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Only about 6 g, making it more of a treat than a protein source.

faqs.q: Do cinnamon rolls have trans fats?
faqs.a: Some commercial versions have 0.5 g or less; opt for homemade to avoid.
